objects.specification: A flat classroom floor covered in a dinosaur-themed pattern or color palette featuring subtle prehistoric motifs. The surface has a low-profile texture in warm earth tones that tie the overall decor together while remaining durable for high-traffic educational use.

A vertical indoor wall covered with smooth plaster in a warm, neutral earth-tone finish that creates a prehistoric classroom ambiance. The flat surface is ready for mounting educational boards, posters, or other display elements.

A vertical indoor wall covered with smooth plaster in a warm, neutral earth-tone finish that creates a prehistoric classroom ambiance. The flat surface is ready for mounting educational boards, posters, or other display elements.

A vertical indoor wall covered with smooth plaster in a warm, neutral earth-tone finish that creates a prehistoric classroom ambiance. The flat surface is ready for mounting educational boards, posters, or other display elements.

A flat ceiling surface finished in a soft neutral earth tone, providing an unobtrusive backdrop for mounted lighting and projection equipment. The ceiling complements the walls to maintain a warm prehistoric atmosphere and supports various ceiling fixtures.

A large teacher’s desk with a rectangular top finished in a darker wood tone that exhibits rich grain patterns. The desk features a solid base and modesty panel, giving it a commanding presence and ensuring durability while facing the student area for optimal interaction.

A large rectangular blackboard with a dinosaur-themed decorative border, featuring a smooth deep-black writing surface framed in light wood. Subtle dinosaur scale motifs are integrated into the frame design, making it both educational and visually engaging.

A ceiling-mounted projector unit with a compact white casing and clean lines. It features side vents, a prominent lens on the front, and is precisely aligned to cast images onto the front board for clear overhead display.

A standard student desk with a rectangular tabletop finished in a natural wood tone, showcasing a subtle wood grain texture. It is supported by slender wood-tone legs and has clean straight edges for a simple yet durable classroom design.

A student chair with a molded wooden seat and backrest finished in a complementary reddish-brown hue reminiscent of dinosaur fossils. The chair stands on slender metal legs, featuring a slightly curved back for ergonomic support and a smooth finish that complements the natural wood desks.

A tall wooden bookshelf finished in a natural wood tone, featuring multiple evenly spaced shelves. It is filled with dinosaur-themed books and small replica models, creating a decorative and educational display along the side wall.

A realistic dinosaur skeleton replica model constructed from off-white composite material. The bones are intricately detailed and mounted on a sturdy base, arranged in an active pose that serves as the classroom centerpiece.

A potted prehistoric-style plant with broad, textured leaves resembling ancient foliage. The plant sits in a simple ceramic pot with an earthy finish and adds a vibrant green accent to the classroom decor.

A circular wall clock with a simple neutral-finish frame and clear numeric markings. The clock face features a subtle dinosaur motif at its center and sleek hands for easy reading.

A recessed ceiling light fixture featuring a square panel with diffused white light. It has a thin trim and provides bright, even illumination across the classroom, complementing ambient and directional lighting.

A small cylindrical waste bin made of durable metal with a matte neutral finish. The bin features a smooth exterior with a slightly flared top edge for easy disposal and maintenance.

A large rectangular window with a slim frame, featuring semi-transparent curtains in a soft earth tone. The design allows plenty of natural light to filter in and enhances the warm prehistoric-themed classroom atmosphere.

A dinosaur-themed educational poster printed on matte paper, showcasing vivid illustrations and labeled diagrams of different dinosaur species. The poster is framed with a thin border and designed to be mounted flat against the wall for visual learning.
